entity.name: trade_buy
entity.query: select id, cid, title, province_code, area_code, quantity, quantity_year, quantity_untis, valid_days, details_query, gmt_refresh, gmt_expired, message_count, pause_status, check_status, del_status from trade_buy
entity.deltaQuery: select id from trade_buy where gmt_modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: select id, cid, title, province_code, area_code, quantity, quantity_year, quantity_untis, valid_days, details_query, gmt_refresh, gmt_expired, message_count, pause_status, check_status, del_status from trade_buy where gmt_modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
